faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Your guide to our fire protection services.

q1.question: What fire alarm systems do you install?
q1.answer: We install both addressable and conventional fire alarm systems from leading manufacturers. Our systems include smoke detectors, heat detectors, manual call points, and integrated control panels with 24/7 monitoring capabilities.

q2.question: Do you provide Civil Defense certification?
q2.answer: Yes, all our installations are fully compliant with Saudi Civil Defense regulations. We handle the entire certification process, from design approval to final inspection and certificate issuance.

q3.question: What maintenance services do you offer?
q3.answer: We offer comprehensive maintenance contracts including quarterly inspections, annual testing, certified reports, and 24/7 emergency support. All maintenance is performed using original spare parts.

q4.question: Do you serve residential properties?
q4.answer: Yes, we serve commercial, industrial, and residential properties across Saudi Arabia. Our team can design and install fire protection systems suitable for any building type and size.

q5.question: How quickly can you respond to emergencies?
q5.answer: We offer 24/7 emergency service with rapid response times. For maintenance contract clients, we guarantee priority response within hours for critical issues.
